content: Squeeze through the crack in the wall to find a treasure chest that has the Loong Scales inside. Once you have them, a voice will speak to you (and will continue to do so whenever you're close to any of the hidden Loong bosses).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Loong Scales'.
The content is as follows:
Squeeze through the crack in the wall to find a treasure chest that has the Loong Scales inside. Once you have them, a voice will speak to you (and will continue to do so whenever you're close to any of the hidden Loong bosses).
